derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French chan, medieval Latin canus, caanus, from Turkic ḵ̣ān 'lord, prince'

means.word_mean: 1. a title given to rulers or other important people in Asian countries
2. an inn in some Eastern countries with a large courtyard that provides accommodation for caravans
